turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hi there! How are you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm good and you?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Pretty good myself, thank you! What social issue are we supposed to discuss here?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I have to ask my partner (which is you) to gie a specific amount of doantion out of his/her task paymet

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: May I ask for what cause is it for?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Whatever amount you choose to donate from your payment for this taks will be donated to a children's cahrtiy called Save the Children. Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and hleps support children in developing countries.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I see. I guess I can donate $0.20 for now, as I am not guaranteed of how much I will be paid for this task. I really want to support Save the Children since I'm expecting my first child this December and I believe children are a gift from GOD and they should be cherished and taken care of.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Any amount you choose to give will be greatly appreciated. I'm not that exact how much we are going to get paid for this task. I didn't read all instructions carefully lol. Aw that's kinda cool. How old are you??

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Haha. I read that if we finish like 10 responses to each other, the task can be considered a success. I\'m 33 y/o, by the way. It\'s so cool considering that my husband and I only tried getting pregnant in just 2 months after our wedding. We had a long boyfriend/girlfriend relationship before getting married. 9 years to be exact. So this "little one" is really a gift from GOD in JESUS\' Name. How about you, tell me something about yourself.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm 28 years old. Born and raised in Texas. My boyfriend doesn't want to have children until he has his career secured.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Nice. I haven\'t been to Texas. I\'m from California and would love to visit Texas after giving birth. Well, your boyfriend\'s right at some point. It is pretty expensive to have a child these days, anyway. But as they say, "you can never be ready" =) So, I think any time is a good time to have babies. If you don\'t mind me asking, how do you feel about your boyfriend\'s decision? I\'d understand if you don\'t want to talk about it

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well I dont want to have children I prefer adopting one or two. And he is okay with that decision. Yeah you are right, raising children these days are tough. So many expenses. Good thing we have different charities that help out children all over the world, for example, Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I know, right! I just looked up their website and I didn't know they were helping a LOT of children all over the world. It's nice to hear/read stories of hope especially for our younger generation. I know you'd agree with me when I say being a child nowadays is tougher than our time. So much cyber-bullying, etc. Anyway, back to Save the Children, I think they're doing a pretty good job and would read more about them and their advocacies

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I blame technology! lol Save the Children is an amazing charity because it really helps people in need. I also went to their websites and read couple of things

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: True! Anyways, this has been an eye-opening task. Fulfilling and rewarding at the same time, knowing that we have contributed even a small bit to their cause. I think we can submit this now, don't you think? how do we do that anyway? haha

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I dont' think we can submit right now I guess we should continue

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh okay. hmmm, maybe we really have to have at least 10 chat responses to each other. This is going to be my 9th so let's see. I think we've spent a good amount of time on this one

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I know. I guess I have to ask you: How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I see. I can donate $0.20

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: now we finished lol

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It was the 10 chat turns! lol. it was nice chatting with you! May GOD richly bless you and your boyfriend! You can click DONE now. Thanks again
